abilities.name: Split Earth
abilities.description: Splits the earth under target area, causing a delayed eruption that stuns and damages nearby enemies.
abilities.notes: Creates a visible indicator during the delay, warning enemies of the impending eruption.

abilities.name: Diabolic Edict
abilities.description: Unleashes a series of explosions around Leshrac, dealing damage to nearby enemy units, with priority given to the closest units.
abilities.notes: Deals physical damage, making it effective against structures. Each explosion targets the closest enemy unit.

abilities.name: Lightning Storm
abilities.description: Summons a lightning storm that strikes enemy units, jumping to nearby enemies. Each jump deals damage and slows the target.
abilities.notes: Always prioritizes heroes over other units when jumping. Won't strike the same unit twice.

abilities.name: Pulse Nova
abilities.description: Summons a damaging nova of energy around Leshrac that damages nearby enemies. Consumes mana per second while active.
abilities.notes: Toggling has a 1-second cooldown. Initial activation has no mana cost, but drains mana continuously.

innate_abilities.name: Defilement
innate_abilities.description: Leshrac's spells gain increased radius based on his intelligence and hero level.
innate_abilities.notes: Increases the radius of all Leshrac's area of effect spells based on his intelligence.
